title: Replace Santanu Sir teacher profile image with uploaded photo

requirements.text: Replace the existing teacher profile image for Santanu Sir in the Teachers component (frontend/src/components/Teachers.tsx) with the newly uploaded photo 'image (2)-4.jpg' showing him in a white patterned shirt with a mustache speaking at a microphone with decorative background including silver streamers and floral wall decorations
acceptanceCriteria: Santanu Sir's profile card displays the uploaded photo 'image (2)-4.jpg' instead of the current placeholder/image
The image is properly sized and maintains aspect ratio within the teacher profile card
The image styling is consistent with the other teacher profile images (Sonali Ma'am, Abhijit Da)
The image displays correctly on both desktop and mobile views
The image maintains the gold/yellow and maroon accent color scheme of the site

requirements.text: Store the uploaded Santanu Sir photo 'image (2)-4.jpg' as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: The image file is saved in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
The Teachers component references the correct asset path for Santanu Sir's image
The image loads successfully when the page is rendered

requirements.text: Update the TeachersNotes component (frontend/src/components/TeachersNotes.tsx) to reference the new Santanu Sir profile image from 'image (2)-4.jpg' for the 'Class 4 – 12' notes card, maintaining consistency with the Teachers component
acceptanceCriteria: The TeachersNotes component displays the same Santanu Sir image as the Teachers component
The 'Class 4 – 12' notes card shows the uploaded photo consistently
Image styling matches between Teachers and TeachersNotes components
The image displays properly in the tabbed notes interface

constraints: Do not modify the Teachers component structure or layout beyond updating the image source
Maintain bilingual support for all existing text content
Preserve the existing design theme (gold/yellow text, dark background, maroon accents)
Do not change the teacher profile information (name, classes, subjects, experience, teaching focus)
nonGoals: Modifying the Teachers component layout or structure
Changing the TeachersNotes component functionality beyond image update
